Subject: Daycoval - Disk and resources expansion
Description:
Hello Team,

Do you have availability for tomorrow (thursday) 16h BRT to expand and optimize a server that we are checking up? Its a costumer with 4000 computers running. Thank you.

Best regards,
Solution_Comment__c: Closing ticket as resolved. Expanded RAM and vcpus on server backend on call, they asked to expand disk space too, but the drive did not seem to be expanded yet from the virtual machine. Then helped in resolving a firewall issue they were having getting to the liveupdate server.
